DOC.brief_summary: Tracheostomy is worldwide used for critically ill patients. The aim of our study is to assess the mortality, quality of life, laryngeal function, procedures, early and late complications of tracheostomy performed for critically ill patients admitted in intensive care units.
DOC.brief_title: Procedures, Complications and Follow-up of Tracheostomy in Intensive Care Units.
DOC.criteria: age > 18 years indications for tracheostomy Infection/inflammation of neck tissue Previous neck surgery causing abnormal anatomy of the site Recent surgery of cervical spine
